Detect HPC Environment

Source: R/detectHPC.R
detectHPC.Rd

Detect if R is running on a high-performance computing (HPC) cluster.

detectHPC()

Value

Scheduler name if HPC is detected (e.g. LSF, SLURM), otherwise FALSE.

Note

Currently supports detection of HMS Orchestra.

See also

  • Sys.getenv().

  • Sys.info().

  • R.version.

  • .Platform.

Other Developer Functions: dots, localOrRemoteFile, methodFormals, multiassignAsEnvir, printString

Examples

detectHPC()
#> [1] FALSE
